query: Episode { info { title episodeNumber } results { name characters } }
Query ($episodeId: ID!) { episode(id: $episodeId) { info { director writer } } }
Mutation { createCharacter(name: "New Character", age: 25, species: HUMAN) { id name } }
Query { characters(first: 10) { edges { node { id name } } } }
Episode { info { title episodeNumber } results { name director } }
Query ($director: String!) { episodes(director: $director) { edges { node { id title } } } }
Query ($sort: SortEpisodeInput!) { episodes(sort: $sort) { edges { node { id title episodeNumber } } } }
Mutation { updateCharacter(id: 1, input: { name: "Updated Name" }) { id name } }
